info.title: Warpcast API
info.description: API for interacting with the Warpcast platform

tags.name: User
tags.description: Operations related to user information and preferences

tags.name: Messaging
tags.description: Operations related to direct messages and casts

tags.name: DevTools
tags.description: Development tools and utilities for Farcaster integration

get.description: Retrieves the current onboarding state for the authenticated user
Retrieves user information based on FID

200.description: Successful retrieval of user by fid

get.description: Retrieves direct casts sent to the authenticated user

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of conversations to retrieve

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving next page

schema.description: Base64 encoded cursor from previous response

200.description: Successful retrieval of direct cast inbox

get.description: Retrieves application context information for the authenticated user

200.description: Successful retrieval of user app context

get.description: Retrieves preference settings for the authenticated user
Retrieves a list of featured or recommended channels

post.description: Retrieves feed content based on provided filters and parameters

updateState.description: Whether to update the feed state

get.description: Retrieves detailed user information based on FID
Retrieves channels that the authenticated user is following

parameters.name: forComposer
parameters.description: Whether results are intended for the composer interface

200.description: Successful retrieval of user by username

get.summary: Get unseen counts and feed state

200.description: Successful retrieval of unseen feed and notification data

get.summary: Get casts from a user thread
get.description: Retrieves casts from a specific thread by a user

parameters.name: castHashPrefix
parameters.description: The hash prefix of the cast

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user

200.description: Successful retrieval of user thread casts

get.summary: Get mutual followers in a channel

200.description: Successful retrieval of known channel followers

get.summary: Get notifications for a specific tab
get.description: Returns a list of notifications for the specified tab.

parameters.name: tab
parameters.description: Notification tab type

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of notifications to return

put.description: Updates the last checked timestamp for notifications.

get.description: Fetches a direct cast conversation by conversationId.

parameters.name: conversationId
parameters.description:
Conversation ID. Format depends on conversation type:
- 1:1 conversations: "fid1-fid2" (e.g., "123-456")
- Group conversations: Hash format (e.g., "a1b2c3d4e5f6...")

get.description: Fetches messages from a direct cast conversation by conversationId with pagination support.

parameters.name: conversationId
parameters.description:
Conversation ID. Format depends on conversation type:
- 1:1 conversations: "fid1-fid2" (e.g., "123-456")
- Group conversations: Hash format (e.g., "c9e139dcbc9423cf")

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to return

200.description: A list of direct cast conversation messages with pagination

get.summary: Get recent messages from direct cast conversation
get.description: Fetches recent messages from a direct cast conversation by conversationId.

parameters.name: conversationId
parameters.description:
Conversation ID. Format depends on conversation type:
- 1:1 conversations: "fid1-fid2" (e.g., "123-456")
- Group conversations: Hash format (e.g., "c9e139dcbc9423cf")

200.description: A list of recent direct cast conversation messages

put.description: Sends a direct cast message to specified recipients in a conversation.

get.description: Retrieves a list of discoverable channels with optional limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of channels to retrieve

get.description: Returns the number of allocated and currently available invites.
Returns a list of Warpcast-sponsored invites available to the user.
Returns a list of users in the rewards leaderboard based on invite activity.

get.summary: Get invite rewards scores for a user
get.description: Returns current, previous, and all-time invite rewards scores for the specified user.
Returns metadata for the invite rewards program including the reward period and reward distribution details.
Returns the most recent casts bookmarked by the user.
Returns starter packs created by a specific user.
Returns a list of suggested starter packs.

200.description: A list of suggested starter packs

get.summary: Get a specific starter pack by ID
get.description: Returns a specific starter pack.

get.summary: Get users in a specific starter pack
get.description: Returns a list of users associated with a given starter pack.

200.description: List of users in the starter pack

get.description: Returns metadata about a channel.

get.summary: Get members of a specific channel
get.description: Returns users who are members of a specific channel.

200.description: A list of users in the specified channel

get.summary: Get users a given user is following
get.description: Returns a list of users followed by a specified FID.

get.summary: Get users following a given user
get.description: Returns a list of users who follow the specified FID.

get.summary: Get mutual followers of a given user
get.description: Returns a list of users who follow the given FID and are followed by the viewer.
Returns a list of top FrameApps with optional pagination.

get.summary: Get verified addresses for an FID
get.description: Returns verified Ethereum addresses associated with a specific FID.
Returns a list of muted keywords for the authenticated user.

post.description: Mutes a keyword for the authenticated user with specified properties.

200.description: The muted keyword and its settings
A list of users who recasted the cast
A list of quote casts referencing the given cast
A list of draft cast storms

get.summary: Retrieve casts for a specific user

schema.description: The FID (Farcaster ID) of the user whose casts to retrieve
Maximum number of casts to return

channelKey.description: Optional channel to post the cast to

get.description: Returns a list of all channels on Warpcast

get.summary: Get details of a specific channel
Get list of channels followed by a user

200.description: Successful response with list of followed channels

get.summary: Check if a user is following a channel

200.description: Successful response with list of members

memberAt.description: Timestamp when the user became a member

200.description: Successful response with list of channel invites

post.summary: Invite a user to a channel

channelId.description: ID of the channel to invite the user to

inviteFid.description: Farcaster ID of the user being invited

role.description: Role of the invited user within the channel

delete.summary: Remove a user's invite from a channel

channelId.description: ID of the channel from which the user's invite is being removed

removeFid.description: Farcaster ID of the user whose invite is being removed

role.description: Role associated with the invite being removed

channelId.description: ID of the channel for which the invite is being accepted

role.description: Role that the user will have in the channel

accept.description: Flag indicating whether to accept the invite

get.summary: Get moderated casts for a channel

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: ID of the channel to get moderation actions for

200.description: Successful response with list of moderation actions

channelId.description: ID of the channel where the cast was moderated

moderatedAt.description: Unix timestamp of when the moderation action was taken

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results

get.summary: Get restricted users in a channel

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: ID of the channel to get restricted users for

200.description: Successful response with list of restricted users

fid.description: Farcaster ID of the restricted user

channelId.description: ID of the channel where the user is restricted

restrictedAt.description: Unix timestamp of when the user was restricted

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results

get.summary: Get banned users in a channel

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: ID of the channel to get banned users for

200.description: Successful response with list of banned users

fid.description: Farcaster ID of the banned user

channelId.description: ID of the channel where the user is banned

bannedAt.description: Unix timestamp of when the user was banned

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of banned users

post.summary: Ban a user from a channel

channelId.description: ID of the channel from which to ban the user

banFid.description: Farcaster ID of the user to ban

delete.summary: Unban a user from a channel

channelId.description: ID of the channel from which to unban the user

banFid.description: Farcaster ID of the user to unban

channelId.description: ID of the channel to follow
ID of the channel to unfollow

castHash.description: Hash of the cast to moderate

action.description: Type of moderation action to apply

put.summary: Pin a cast to a channel

castHash.description: Hash of the cast to pin

notifyChannelFollowers.description: Whether to notify followers of the channel about the pin

delete.summary: Unpin a cast from a channel

channelId.description: ID of the channel from which to unpin a cast

200.description: Successful response with list of discoverable actions

actions.name: Upthumb
actions.description: Give casts 'upthumbs' and see them on a leaderboard.

200.description: Successful response with list of discoverable composer actions
Successful response with list of blocked users

blockerFid.description: Farcaster ID of the user who blocked

blockedFid.description: Farcaster ID of the user who was blocked

createdAt.description: Unix timestamp of when the user was blocked

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of blocked users

blockFid.description: Farcaster ID of the user to block

success.description: Indicates whether the block operation was successful

unblockFid.description: Farcaster ID of the user to unblock

success.description: Indicates whether the unblock operation was successful

200.description: Successful response with list of account verifications

parameters.name: periodsAgo
parameters.description: How many periods ago to fetch the results for. 0 or undefined returns results for the most recent period.

200.description: Successful response with creator reward winners history

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: The protocol of the address to fetch.

200.description: Successful response with the user's primary address.

parameters.name: fids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of FIDs to fetch primary addresses for.

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: The protocol of the addresses to fetch.

200.description: Successful response with list of primary addresses.

fid.description: The Farcaster ID of the user

success.description: Whether the address was successfully retrieved

address.description: Present only if success is true

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Starter pack ID, as found in the public Warpcast pack URL or in the non-authed public API of starter pack metadata.

200.description: Successful response with list of starter pack members.

fid.description: The Farcaster ID of the starter pack member

memberAt.description: Timestamp in milliseconds when the user became a member

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next set of results

put.summary: Send a Direct Cast via External API
put.description: Send a programmatic Direct Cast to a recipient. The request must include a unique idempotency key.

recipientFid.description: The Farcaster ID of the recipient.

idempotencyKey.description: A unique key to ensure idempotency.

example.message: this is a programmatic Direct Cast

success.description: Indicates if the direct cast was sent successfully

get.description: Retrieves user information associated with the provided Ethereum verification address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Ethereum address used for user verification

404.description: No user found for the provided address

get.description: Provides access to all winners for a given period (week). Paginated, with the list of winners in rank order. Not authenticated.

parameters.name: periodsAgo
parameters.description: How many periods ago to fetch the results for. 0 or undefined returns results for the most recent period.

200.description: A paginated list of developer reward winners

periodStartTimestamp.description: Unix time in milliseconds when rewards period began

periodEndTimestamp.description: Unix time in milliseconds when rewards period ended

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results

get.description:
Retrieves a list of apps (aka "frames") created by a specific author on Warpcast, using their FID (Farcaster ID).
The response includes metadata for each app, including icons, URLs, and author profile details.

200.description: A list of frames by the author

get.description: Fetches verification and manifest information for a Farcaster domain

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain to retrieve manifest information for

verified.description: Indicates if the domain is verified

manifest.description: JSON string containing the raw manifest data

fid.description: Farcaster ID associated with the domain

key.description: Public key associated with the domain

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the data was last updated

get.summary: Fetch meta tags from a URL
get.description: Retrieves metadata and Open Graph information from a specified URL

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL to fetch metadata from

apple-mobile-web-app-capable.description: Apple mobile web app capability setting

get.summary: Fetch Farcaster JSON data from a domain
get.description: Retrieves Farcaster account association and frame information for a specified domain

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain to fetch Farcaster JSON data from

header.description: Base64 encoded header containing FID, type, and key information

payload.description: Base64 encoded payload containing domain information

homeUrl.description: URL of the frame's home page

splashBackgroundColor.description: Background color for the splash screen in hex format

get.summary: Retrieve domains owned by the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of domains that are owned by the currently authenticated user.

domains.description: List of domains owned by the authenticated user

get.summary: Retrieve API keys for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of API keys associated with the user's account, including active and revoked keys

403.description: Forbidden - User doesn't have permission to access API keys

put.description: Creates a new API key with the specified description and expiration date

parameters.name: idempotency-key
parameters.description: A unique key to ensure idempotency of the request

description.description: User-provided description of the API key's purpose

expiresAt.description: Timestamp when the API key should expire (in milliseconds since epoch)

id.description: Unique identifier for the created API key

secretKey.description: The secret key value that should be used for authentication (only returned once at creation)

403.description: Forbidden - User doesn't have permission to create API keys

patch.description: Revokes an existing API key making it no longer valid for authentication

parameters.name: idempotency-key
parameters.description: A unique key to ensure idempotency of the request

id.description: ID of the API key to revoke

403.description: Forbidden - User doesn't have permission to revoke API keys

404.description: Not Found - API key with specified ID does not exist

get.description: Retrieves a list of external social accounts connected to the user's Warpcast profile

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of connected accounts to return

connectedAccountId.description: Unique identifier for the connected account

platform.description: Social platform name (e.g., x, github, lens)

get.summary: Get casts from a user's profile
get.description: Retrieves a list of casts published by a specific user identified by their Farcaster ID (FID).

parameters.name: fid
parameters.description: Farcaster ID of the user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of casts to return

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination

cursor.description: Cursor for fetching the next page of results

get.summary: Retrieve liked casts by user FID

parameters.name: fid
parameters.description: The user's fid (user id) whose liked casts are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to limit per request.

post.description:
Retrieves analytics data for miniapps over a specified date range,
providing various metrics broken down by configured dimensions.

startDate.description: Start date in format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or relative like '28daysago'

endDate.description: End date in format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or relative like 'today'

values.description: Values to filter the dimension by

dimensions.description: Dimensions to break down the data by

order.description: Sort order for the breakdown results

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to access this data

get.description:
Validates a Mini App URL by checking for proper embedding code and manifest,
returning information about its compatibility with the Warpcast platform.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the Mini App to inspect

200.description: Successful inspection of the Mini App URL

statusCode.description: HTTP status code returned by the URL

miniAppEmbedPresent.description: Indicates if the Mini App embedding code is present

miniAppManifestPresent.description: Indicates if the Mini App manifest is present

miniAppEmbedValid.description: Indicates if the Mini App embedding code is valid

miniAppManifestValid.description: Indicates if the Mini App manifest is valid

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to use this endpoint

get.description: Retrieves metadata and information about an image at a specified URL, including size, cache settings, and loading time.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the image to inspect

url.description: The URL of the inspected image

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the response

cacheHeader.description: The cache header used by the image

imageSizeBytes.description: Size of the image in bytes

imageLoadTimeMs.description: Time taken to load the image in milliseconds

get.summary: Export user data for a specific mini app domain
get.description: Retrieves a list of users who have interacted with a specified mini app domain, including their Farcaster IDs and notification tokens.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain name of the mini app to export user data for

200.description: Successfully retrieved mini app user data

schema.description: CSV formatted data with columns for fid, notificationToken, and added status

notificationToken.description: Token used for sending notifications to the user

added.description: Whether the user has been added/registered with the mini app

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions or not the owner of the specified domain

404.description: Domain not found or not registered as a mini app

count.description: Number of users who reacted with this emoji

emoji.description: Emoji used for the reaction (legacy field)

userFids.description: List of Farcaster IDs who reacted

isLastReadMessage.description: Whether this is the last read message

conversationId.description: ID of the conversation this message belongs to

senderFid.description: Farcaster ID of the message sender

serverTimestamp.description: Server timestamp when message was sent (Unix milliseconds)

reactions.description: List of reactions to the message

isProgrammatic.description: Whether the message was sent programmatically

mentions.description: List of mentions in the message

casts.description: Cast metadata if message contains cast references

urls.description: URL metadata if message contains links

medias.description: Media metadata if message contains media

textIndex.description: Starting index of the mention in the message text

name.description: Name of the conversation (for group conversations)

lastReadTime.description: Timestamp of last read time (Unix milliseconds)

isGroup.description: Whether this is a group conversation

createdAt.description: Timestamp when conversation was created (Unix milliseconds)

hasUnreadRequests.description: Whether user has unread conversation requests

success.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful

cursor.description: Cursor for pagination to get next set of messages

conversationId.description: ID of the conversation to send the message to

recipientFids.description: Array of Farcaster IDs of message recipients

inReplyToId.description: ID of the message this is replying to (optional)

success.description: Whether the message was sent successfully

allocatedInvitesCount.description: Total number of invites allocated to the user

availableInvitesCount.description: Number of invites currently available to send

hash.description: Unique hash identifier for the cast

threadHash.description: Hash identifier for the thread this cast belongs to

parentHash.description: Hash identifier of the parent cast (if this is a reply)

text.description: The text content of the cast

frameName.description: The name of the frame (mini app)

walletAddress.description: The wallet address of the winner (optional)

id.description: Unique identifier for the API key

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the API key was created (in milliseconds since epoch)

expiresAt.description: Timestamp when the API key expires (in milliseconds since epoch)

revokedAt.description: Timestamp when the API key was revoked, if applicable (in milliseconds since epoch)

tag.description: Short identifier tag for the API key

description.description: User-provided description of the API key's purpose

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: Maximum number of items to return

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found
